title: specification for referencing an external file for different components

coreProperties.description: core component properties as defined by the specific component spec file. These properties are described by the common part of the part number
coreProperties.example: this might include everything about an MCU other than flash size

additionalCoreProperties.description: core component properties as defined by the specific component spec file. These properties are described by the changing part of the part number
additionalCoreProperties.example: this might include the MCU flash size

pins.description: pin properties specified by the pin spec file

package.description: package information specified by the package spec file

thermal.description: component temperature and thermal resistance information
